title: GARBAGE
description: Curated by Luis Ortega Govela and Olivia Erlanger

title: Just Kids
description: Just Kids is a memoir by Patti Smith, published on January 19, 2010, documenting her relationship with artist Robert Mapplethorpe.

title: Sobre Heroes y Tumbas
description: Novel by Argentine writer Ernesto Sabato, first published in Buenos Aires in 1961 and translated by Helen R. Lane in 1981
